review_text:
Stephen’s place was amazing. The interior was so well decorated and welcoming. He provided all the extras you could need from kitchen tools, to shower essentials, even contact solution which I desperately needed.
The outside was warm and welcoming, with cornhole and a fire pit with an incredible view.
We’ve stayed in dozens of bnbs and this was one of our best experiences yet. We will be back!

Stephen’s historic home exudes timeless elegance and charm, with a charming porch that offers a breathtaking panoramic view of Knoxville! It’s the perfect retreat for a weekend getaway filled with historic ambiance and natural beauty. When in Knoxville, we will definitely stay at Stephen’s home again!
Very cozy place, I would definitely stay again.
2nd time staying there overnight! Really nice place

My dogs and I loved our stay at the cottage home. It was very peaceful, clean, decorated nicely, dog friendly, had the amenities as described, and you would never know it's a very short drive to everything in the area. I definitely recommend the home and would definitely stay again.
Stayed there for one night to sleep while going down south. Great little place and exactly what we needed
This place was a cute little spot for a weekend trip! Had everything we needed and in a peaceful location.
Great little place in a great location! Perfect for a quick trip!
Amazing host. We would definitely stay again!
Tiny little 1 bedroom home with all the necessities and a giant yard for our dogs to play. Squeeky clean, cumfy beds, nice neighborhood. Fit our needs perfectly!!

This was a fine place to stop overnight on our cross country road trip. It was decorated nicely and the bed was comfortable. However, the air conditioner smelled musty and has been installed in a plywood square in the window with gaps, which made it a bit challenging for allergies during pollen season. There is not a ton of privacy when showering at night (the window is sort of see-through with no blind). There is no shower fan in the bathroom. Overall it was great for our purposes of a one night, in and out stay. Thanks!

We had such a nice stay here. It was close to downtown Knoxville but far away enough that we could enjoy the scenery. It was also close to come very good hikes and a state forest to hike in. We definitely recommend this place if you’re staying in Knoxville.
Good location and off the street so we felt safe especially with our cars filled to the brim as we are moving across the country.

Great, quiet getaway with plenty to do around the area. Because we were there for a National Specialty, we weren't there most of the day, so it suited our needs as a quiet place to rest between all of the activities. Our dogs appreciated the quiet too, and large yard to exercise. Perfect little airbnb. Thank you for having us!
Quiet beautiful place with a lot of local things to do and very peaceful

The house was cozy and comfortable. The memory foam mattress was amazing! The entire house was clean. The bath towels and washcloths were very soft as well. I did have to purchase a skillet and a few storage containers because I like to cook. There wasn’t a wide variety of cookware. Plenty of silverware, bowls, plates and cups, other than that, I would stay there again. It felt like home away from home.
Great place to stay while we were in town for Big Ears! The host was very responsive and accommodating.
great host nice spot
Nathan was communicative and responsive. This spot was perfect for getting right into downtown Knoxville. There was plenty of room and private areas in and out of the cottage.
Cute house with a great price and location just mins from downtown! We will be back soon. Thanks again for letting us stay!😊
Felt very cozy and comfortable enjoyed our stay!

We enjoyed our stay so much. The cottage was adorable! We were inspired.
Everything was clean and well decorated. It had everything we needed. It was very peaceful yet close to anything we wanted to do.
Nathan was very pleasant and accommodating. We are grateful to have had this experience.
Highly recommend.

Had a wonderful stay here. Was perfect for our weekend stay. Even spent a day in Gatlinburg. Host was very helpful and welcoming. The place is very peaceful and quiet, had everything you need for a weekend stay or a long stay. Would definitely stay again.
Another great stay! Nathan is an awesome host!

Nathan was a very responsive and helpful host. The house is perfect for a couple to get away to the smokies! Very clean and had all the odds and ends you could think of (pots ,pans condiments, seasoning) all I would say is it is more of like a 40 minute drive to peigon forge( the tourist area). But it’s great to be away from all the tourist and congested areas. All and all amazing experience and would recommend
Beautiful place. Thank you so much
It met my need of a silent retreat, grateful
Everything was as described and did not experience any problems. Thank you!
Nathan was a great host. Made a very last minute reservation for us, and it was easy as could be. Home was very clean and comfortable. We will be back!

The perfect house for what I needed, and described exactly how it was. I was traveling across the country and needed a place for me, my husband and our 2 little dogs. This was just what I wanted with a big back private yard and a very comfy bed and clean house. Check in was super easy, and communication very clear. If I ever need to travel by car through Knoxville again, I’ll definitely keep this beautiful house in mind.
Thanks for a comfortable stay!
Great quiet place to stay. Tucked away from the roads but still in a convenient location. Walmart and store alike 5 minutes away!

Great little house, just perfect for our visit! Country feel, yet just minutes to town. Very responsive and nice! Great yard to throw the ball with my dog! We will definitely be checking to see if this place is available on our next visit!
Cozy getaway a short drive from downtown Knoxville- would definitely book again in the future!
Good location and price. Will definitely be back.
Location is lovely. Rural with semi-busy road out front. The place is small but absolutely adequate for our one-night stay on a relocation trip across the country. Thanks, Nathan.

Nathan’s place was a great get away while we were there for the poultry show! It was perfect for us to stay for two nights, the place was easy to find (kind of hard at night but not too bad). We enjoy the homeyness they have there! Thank you for such a great place

Host was very friendly and responsive, and allowed us to check in with very little notice the night of our stay. Coffee maker fully stocked, adorable scrap book, functioning heater and cozy decor made this place feel very homey. My k9 loved the backyard to run in and stretch his legs after being in the car for so long. My only complaint is the cleaning fee was pretty steep, but that is to be expected with a pet friendly stay. The hosts were very responsive and helpful! Would stay here again!

This was the perfect spot for us and our dogs to stay while visiting family over the Thanksgiving holiday. The space was clean, comfortable, and exactly as described in the listing. Our dogs loved the yard space, and it was close enough to the highway to make our daily trips to Maryville convenient. The hosts were very welcoming, responsive, and kind. I would love to stay again if we're in the area.
Very nice stay !! Everything was nice and clean and it’s a cute little house !
Great place to stay
Everything was great
The place was in a great location, and the host was very responsive and helpful when I left something behind.

Very nice accommodations for one or two people. Clean and well decorated and excellent wi-fi service. The location is only a mile from major groceries, chain stores and restaurants and about 10 minutes from Downtown Knoxville. Nathan was an excellent host - clear communications and directions.
It was fine.

Nathan's place was exactly what we needed as a soft spot to land after each day exploring the area. It was clean, on par with our expectations, and the perfect size for the two of us and two dogs. We loved the spacious back yard and their dog, Willow, was a sweetheart.
Very convenient, pleasant accomodations, and Nathan was a super-responsive host even though I just had minor questions.
We liked the close proximity to downtown and stores.

Very cute little place. Everything was clean and we had everything we needed. I forgot to buy coffee but thankfully discovered there were already pods there! Easy to get to downtown knoxville and Neyland!

This was our 3rd or 4th time staying in Nathan's place. It is always clean, reasonably priced and the dogs are always welcome. We have met both Nathan and Hannah and they are both wonderful, kind people--as well as gracious hosts.
Booked because it was dog friendly and central location. This host communicates quickly and we had zero issues. I would book again
Loved our stay. Was perfect for our weekend. Very close to Neyland. Cozy and quiet. Bed was extremely comfortable!

This was our second time staying here and it was just as wonderful as the first! If you are looking for a quiet, clean, home away from home, then this is your place! It is close to major highways and things to do, but also far enough away from everything in a nice, quiet neighborhood. This is our go-to place to stay when we are in the Knoxville area and won't stay anywhere else!

Perfect for what we needed. Thankfully, didn’t need to bother Nathan but nothing bad to say about the place. Located near a lot to do or within a reasonable drive. So much good food too, can’t go wrong with almost any place you choose. Nathan had great recommendations on where to go and really made it seem like he wanted to make sure our stay was as good as it could be! Highly recommend for anyone looking for an easy and comfortable stay!
Great place to stay. Easy access to grocery stores and restaurants.
Absolutely fantastic stay! Clean, comfy, and quiet. Thanks Nathan!!!

Quiet, residential neighborhood with big yard for walking my dogs. A little difficult to find after sunset, but keeping GPS on and the fact that there were trash cans by the road made it easier.
It had everything I needed. Close to downtown and an easy trip to TN Smokies stadium or Buc-ee’s gas station.

It was a great stay for my husband and I and 2 littles! It had almost everything we needed (coffee was limited) but we went out a lot.
The location was perfect for us and conveniently located around a lot of stores and close to Knoxville. very quiet and felt like you were in the country!
We would stay here again!

We had a great stay! It's a great loaction, no more than 10-20 min drive depending on where you're going around Knoxville. Also have plenty of restaurants, grocery, and gas options a few min away. The place was comfortable and kept cool. We chose this house for being pet friendly and it definitely was. Great yard space for our pups to run around and plenty of indoor space for their crates.
Cute house super quite

This tiny “cottage” or “tiny house” feel was just what I needed after driving 10 hours. The property was very relaxing and safe for a single woman. Just off a main road and close to gas, food store etc.
Decent little place, but not ideal if you plan on doing lots of cooking
amazing little house that was perfect for Two people to stay and enjoy the calm while also being close to everything to do in knoxville!
Beautiful place to stay. We love the country setting. We will definitely be staying there again.
Great location & communication! House was so clean!! Perfect house!!
Cute & convenient area!
Great place
Very cute place, and super close to pretty much everything in Knoxville!

Nathan’s place had everything we needed. This little house is perfect for a couple or a small family, but I wouldn’t recommend for couples as the only bathroom is in the bedroom and the door to come and go is also in the bedroom. There are DVDs but no dvd player, but they do have a smart tv for streaming.
Great spot with easy access to all things Knoxville. For a small house it felt rather spacious. Kitchen was well stocked with pots/pans and utensils.
Nathan’s place was great! Very clean, private and close to everything we needed.

We were in town for the high school crew Nationals and this was a great location for us. It was also super convenient to bring our dogs so we didn’t have to figure out last minute where they’d go. Highly recommend for this area!
This home was very comfortable and had everything you needed. Location is beautiful and close to everything. If in the area I will stay here again.
Nice private parking and set back off the main road. The space was described well with plenty of space.

Very roomy space for two, we felt right at home! We loved the privacy of the separate little house and parking. We also really enjoyed the peace and quiet of the location while still only a short drive away from downtown. It was the perfect little getaway for my husband and I and our pup. We would definitely stay here again :)
Another great stay! Look forward to next time!
i thought it was amazing, very clean and tidy. I'll request a stay later

First of when we arrive the place it was nice inside and outside. The toilet broke after I used it. I try to use the plugger but didn’t work so I call him to come to fix it. He tried and tried until got it fixed. I wouldn’t recommend use the toilet at all so we go to restaurants to use the restroom. The bed was too super soft. We couldn’t sleep at all. The couch has pull out bed is bad when you are seating down and the cushions is super soft too. Seating down to the metal frames making us uncomfortable. The internet is weak or bad connection. The lighting inside the house is bad. Hard to see around the house at night. I’m glad they have table trays so we can use them for our meals to eat.
This was the perfect stop during our cross country drive north! The bed was super comfy and the layout of the space was very well done! Would stay here again!
The home was perfect for the two of us for the week! The home was very clean and it was very peaceful!
My wife and I had a fantastic stay! Everything is as described, great accommodations, private, and peaceful. Will book again!

This was a very cute little place. It was the perfect size for my family. The back yard really sealed the deal for our happiness. Our pup LOVED all her room to run. The neighbors have barking dogs but after a minute of being outside they settle down. The bed was amazing, I would definitely come back and stay here again.
Great place to stay not too far from downtown Knoxville! Cute, clean 1-bedroom apartment with everything you could need :)
This was the perfect place for a quick weekend getaway with our furbaby!
The proximity to my friends was great. And so many restaurants and shopping close by. Hope this place is available the next time I'm in Knoxville.
Nathan's property was a great stay for the weekend, especially for the good price. He was a great host by being helpful and responsive.

The house was clean and brand new. The bed and pillows were very comfortable. The kitchen had all the supplies to make our coffee and breakfast in the morning. There was a quiet little backyard area. Easy to find and very close to grocery stores, gas and the interstate. The drive to the smokies/pigeon forge/Gaitlinberg was close, less than 50 mins and downtown Knoxville was about 10-15. The house is in a quiet, residential area. We felt very safe and right at home. We had a great stay, thank you!
Great stay! The home was conveniently located, comfortable, and the host was very responsive whenever issue arose. Would stay again.
The house was as described! Very clean and had everything we needed and more for an overnight stop with our 2 dogs. Very comfortable bed! We would stay here again!

We enjoyed our stay at Nathan’s very much. After reading all of the reviews before we booked, we were convinced. He was very responsive and helpful. Even, told us about the barking dogs next door; which didn’t bother us at all. Nathan’s home was clean and clutter-free! It was private and quiet yet very close to restaurants and stores.
Only thing we would recommend is to let the renter know about the heaters in the walls when it’s a little cold. They are built into the walls and white, so aren’t obvious. We kept thinking the ac unit would put out the heat, too. Ha ha!
We highly recommend this quaint little Airbnb! This was our first time staying in an Airbnb and Nathan made it wonderful! Thank you!

Wonderful little place for a couple! Although the road is closer to the house it’s quite and you don’t hear road noise.
Nathan is very friendly and although we didn’t need anything from them, we felt like if we needed anything they would have gone above and beyond to help!
Great cottage and friendly owners
It was a lovely little place!
Great quaint place to stay!

Perfect place for a getaway. Close to a lot of things without the feel of all the hustle and bustle. He made check-ins
so easy and flexible. Great for your doggies. Only downside was the yard didn't have a gate so it wasn't completely closed in to let the dogs run free. But absolutely loved our stay.

We needed a place to stay to spend time with family to celebrate the arrival of our third great granddaughter. We are new “parents” of our 1 year old golden retriever Tucker. And only the 2nd time we’ve traveled with him. He was perfect. He loved the back yard.
I’m sure we will be back.
It was a good location for exploring the Knoxville.
Nice place to stay and the fenced yard was great for the dogs!
We had a great time! The house was in a quiet neighborhood but only 15 minutes from downtown Knoxville. Highly recommend!

This was the perfect location, perfect size, perfect check-in, perfect communication, perfect everything! I will be back and certainly hope this is available. There are not enough great words to say. Thank you for a relaxing long weekend. Oh, did I mention perfect?!?
Nathan’s place was great! Very comfortable, cozy, and had everything we needed. The perfect spot to rest for the night.

This was the perfect place to stop for a quick overnight stay during our holiday travel. It was comfortable, clean, and easy to get in and out of. The host also approved our same day reservation and had the space ready for us within just a few hours. We would definitely stay here again!
If you’re traveling with dogs - one thing I would mention is that the neighbors on both sides of the property have several (seemingly friendly) dogs. There is a chain link fence and quite a bit of space separating each neighbor from the rental, but they are very vocal when seeing you and your dogs. One of our dogs has anxiety so that was a little difficult for her. If your pets are reactive or nervous, I’d recommend planning for whatever comforts they need getting in and out of the rental/going potty/etc. That’s no fault of the hosts and not something that was bothersome to us during our stay, but we would have planned a little better if we knew to expect such a warm neighborly greeting :)
Overall great stay!

We had a very short stay but found the entire place to be very clean and comfortable. Got a good night sleep in the comfy bed! We had all the amenities we needed for our quick overnighter. Appreciated the coffee that was provided! The rental is relatively close to the hosts home, but we still felt private.

Nathan's place was just like a little home away from home. It was super clean, and had everything we could have needed and more! It was the perfect place for my boyfriend and I to have a quiet getaway for a few days. We would absolutely recommend it to anyone looking to stay in the Knoxville area!

Very clean; comfortable; convenient location; quiet (except for the neighbor's obnoxious dogs that barked every time I went out with my dogs). Large yard was great for the dogs; it was fenced (except fo the driveway) so I could let me dogs wander. Nathan was very responsive. I would stay here again.
Absolutely spotless. Perfect for our overnight stay. Couch and bed extremely comfortable.

We spent a few nights here during our trip to Knoxville. The place was clean and such a good value. Not extremely far from everything and the neighborhood was peaceful. We will definitely consider Nathan’s place when we return!

Perfect spot for a stop over during our journey. The accommodations were excellent - away from the hustle and bustle of Knoxville, but close if you wanted to explore the city. Also a short trip from their to Pigeon Forge. A great place for our pups to get out and stretch their legs. Bed was extremely comfortable and a very good value for the money. We would definitely stop there again.
We had a great stay you are only 40 minutes from pigeon forge/Gatlinburg. There is plenty to do nearby. It is a nice place and worth the stay. Thank you
Quick overnight on a cross country stay. Easy check in and comfortable lodgings.

Nathan’s place was great! It was only 10 minutes to downtown Knoxville which was very convenient if that’s what you’re in town for! Keep in mind it is a bit of a drive to Pigeon Forge at times only 40 minutes but with traffics could be longer. Nevertheless, the unit was extremely clean and well equipped with everything you could need! Being able to bring our pups is always a plus! Thanks Nathan!
Great location and a great host!
The cutest, quietest little home. Comfortable bed and pet friendly!! Close enough to our daughter/granddaughter without being in a hotel. Will definitely use again when visiting.
This place was a great find - definitely would recommend and stay again in the future. Also, great for dogs due to partial fenced in yard.
Great location, close to everything. Cute place to stay. Willow, the owners dog, was a plus. If we go back to Knoxville, this will be the first place we check.
Nathan’s place was the perfect overnight stay for the two of us and our pup. The space was clean, quiet, and comfortable. We would definitely stay again if back in the area.

Very clean and cozy place. We only stayed for a night but would of loved to stay even longer.
Was a great place for a stop to rest up and recuperate for a long trip
Love this place! Great location with an amazing host!
This was a great place to stay, and very close to everything we explored around Knoxville.
Great place to stay as I was passing through the south.
This is my second time staying at the house and was again impressed with how clean and comfortable the house was. Relaxing on the back porch after working all day is very refreshing.
Cute and comfy cottage. Nice decor, soft bed, and all the kitchen basics to cook your own meals. Just right for our travels. Thanks Nathan!
Mini-farm in the city. Great location and very dog-friendly.
This is a great place to spend the night. Close to all the things for us. Nice little place. When I needed help Nathan was there. I felt safe in the neighborhood.

We were passing through the area for the night and Nathan so graciously allowed us to book late in the day for just an overnight stay. The place is cute, cozy and clean, and the bed was very comfortable. The dog was very patient with me, as I’m not very good at frisbee throwing.
clean,cozy stay. close to food and some shpping.
Quiet guest house not far from the city. Plenty of room for pets.
Super comfortable cottage! Perfect for 2 people and close to everything! Wonderful friendly hosts and sweet pup too! Thank you so much!
Cute little cottage, great location, kind hosts, and a comfy bed. We definitely enjoyed our stay and recommend it!
Cute, clean cottage, awesome host, great location. Highly recommend!
This was a great place to stay. The bed was so comfortable. My girlfriend loved the tub.

This is an excellent spot. It is cozy and clean, easy to get to and has a safe spot to park. I will def. try to stay here when I pass through again. Nathan was very accommodating, I made a very last minute reservation and arrived late and it was easy. I really appreciate it!
Great little hideaway if you need a place to rest while traveling.

Stay was lovely and cozy. The home was equipped with dishes, vaccume, broom and more! The perfect stay for slightly longer than a weekend but great for just a night as well! Nathan was also extremely fast with responding if i had any issues as well! I’d stay here again!!
stayed for 6 days was very cozy
very nice stay! Clean and communication was perfect! Would definitely stay here again
The place was exactly what we needed. Clean and comfortable and easy as pie to check in. Communication was great and we were so grateful for a lovely place to rest our heads.
I was looking for a pet friendly location to stop overnight while moving across the country and this fit the bill. The host was very prompt with communication.
This was a clean and comfortable place to stay. only minutes from downtown and very close to stores and places to eat.
We enjoyed our stay at Nathan’s country cabin. It’s location is close to many restaurants and activities yet it is very quiet and private. We would definitely stay here again.

We loved this place! It was perfect home base for all the little adventures we went on. It was away from the main tourist traps of the smokies. It also allowed us to visit Knoxville while in the area. There was enough room for two people and had all the stuff we needed. If you are a dog lover this is the place! Willow is the best. You will leave Knoxville with a new pal!
Convenient Location!
We had a great stay. The house was clean, comfortable, and convenient for us. The yard and Willow were also both great for tiring out our dog.
Nathan was fantastic and the space was perfect!
Perfect little place for my needs. Being by myself I felt save and anything I needed was close by. Clean and cute. Enjoyed my stay very much!!
Very clean and cozy place to stay.
This place was perfect for us on our move cross country, plenty of parking, quiet neighborhood and had everything we needed. The chickens were so cute !

A really nice guesthouse for those that need a place to stay. Very clean, private parking in the back.
Check-in was super easy. It is close to many restaurants and close to I-40 for those traveling.
Their dog is super smart and loves to play fetch.
Highly recommended.

Great place true to listing. Would agree with others that bed is super comfortable. We stopped by on our way to and back home from vacation. Place was clean and our dogs loved exploring the yard and watching the chickens. Thank you!
Clean, great location, and all around good value! We’ll be back!

This was our short stay between Baton Rouge and Philly.
Everything was accurate per post and nice clean little house in safe neighborhood

We really enjoyed our stay at the cozy cottage. It was very convenient to Knoxville and other surrounding areas. It was very nicely decorated and comfortable. Willow was a perfect dog and tolerable of our dog. The conveniences available in the cottage felt like being home.
Perfect little place for a short term stay! Close to Knoxville with great access to the interstate
A restful, peaceful little back cottage. Plenty of yard to walk and play with your pup, and also take in the beauty of nature.
Great host, great place, great location.
Great home and location! Very comfortable. We will stay again if we are in town.

we loved this little house! what an idyllic vacation spot in east tennessee... it has a large yard with a red barn and chickens running around, and a sweet border color collie named willow to play with our pup.
Being from New Jersey, we live in an area where it's rare to find a place for our dog to have the outdoor experience he needs, so it meant a lot to us to watch him enjoy their land and play to his heart's content. the interior of the house is decorated so well and the touches made me feel at home. they provide condiments in the fridge, cookware, hygeine products, etc. my favorite touch is the local guidebook that was provided to us... it made me feel so welcome in knoxville. thank you both for all of your suggestions and for hosting us!!

Loved being away from the city, but not too far away (who knew a 10 mile trip would only take 16 minutes?! Not this Atlantan!). Quiet, unless you hear a chicken cluck (their scurry is cute when the dinner bell gets rung). Relaxing time away.
Nice house, plenty of grass in the back to walk dogs.
The stay at this home is very comfortable and the host are great! Perfect area with everything youll need just a few minutes in either direction .
Great place for my little stay! Highly recommend

Highly recommend staying here! Stayed for 5 days. It is in a great location, very close to everything you could need, grocery store, resteraunts, etc. Very clean and cozy. Nathan and his wife are very sweet and very responsive whenever we had a need. Very respectful and understanding! And their dog Willow was the cutest. Could play fetch with her for hours. The chickens were very entertaining as well. Would definitely stay here again in the future!

Great little place, we spent one night as a pit stop before heading back to NJ. The bed was so comfortable and best night sleep I had during the whole vacation, haha! Location was great for us to check out the zoo and then go to pigeon forge for dinner and shopping. We’d definitely stay again if in the area!!!

Nathan's place provided everything my family and pets needed for our trip to Knoxville. The house was exactly as described and conveyed in the pictures. While the location itself was on a somewhat busy road, you wouldn't know it with the semi fenced yard behind the house. Willow was the chillest dog ever and feeding the chickens was the best part. We definitely felt welcomed and will definitely be back. I highly recommend Nathan's Airbnb. The location was close to everything Knoxville and not too far from Pigeon's Forge.
Nathan's place is very cozy and close to many things to do. The bed was super comfy and soft. Their dog was very friendly. I would recommend his place if you are in the area!
Cozy house, friendly hosts, and cute animals!

Cute place with a lovely dog named Willow next door (there is a little bucket with tennis ball if you’d like to become friends with Willow). Plenty of grocery stores a few minutes drive down the road. Nathan answered the phone immediately when we had a check-in question, and was very friendly. The rest of our stay was lovely and quiet.
A nice quiet place to stay.
I would definitely stay here again. It was our home base on our wonderful trip with multiple amazing things happening for my fiance and I!
Nathan’s place was great. Very accurate pictures. He was responsive. Great location. Close to shopping and restaurants.

Very clean and cozy cottage. Spent week in Knoxville for work and is was nice to come back to a place at the end of the day with a back porch to relax on. Hosts were very kind and gracious and their dog, Willow, is extremely friendly.....and smart! Looking forward to staying here during my next work trip. Home away from home!
Great place to stop over. Dog friendly. Good yard. Very clean. Comfortable furnishings. Nathan very prompt and helpful. Very nice couple. We enjoyed our stay and will book again if near the area.

Cozy home! This place is so quaint and peaceful. The hosts were welcoming and helpful with anything we needed. They have a sweetheart of a dog who loves to play ball! The bed was so comfortable and they even had things that most people forget. Like cooking spices and shampoo. Would definitely recommend this for anyone staying in the area! We are already figuring out when we can come back.

Clean, well maintained cottage with a large yard in the back. Located fairly close to most of Knoxville's attractions and restaurants.
Linens are provided. Queen size bed with side tables and lamps. Two large closets separate the bedroom and bathroom.
Bathroom is adequate with toilet, sink, and tub/shower. Bring your own personal toiletries; soap, shampoo.
Living room has one small sofa, a side table with lamp, and floor lamp. A large smart TV is on one wall. Host provides streaming service for Netflix, etc.
Kitchen has sink, stove, refrigerator, Keureg coffee maker, and cabinets with dishes available.
Bring your own food and drinks,
K-cups and condiments for coffee.
More comfortable seating is needed and a table or trays for eating. Heat is provided by two wall heaters and cooling by two window units. Nicely decorated and bright.
Everything was great.
Great spot for a few days in Knoxville. Quiet, clean, spacious and comfortable!
Super clean, cozy space!
Perfect little spot, it’s actually even cuter in person! We chose this because it was pet friendly, but didn’t end up having our dog with us. It was cozy and quiet and had everything we needed.
Cozy place, convenient location, big yard for pups, and lots of space inside - bedroom, living room, and kitchen nook.

Nathan’s guest house is the perfect size and space for a couple needing a getaway, or perhaps parents looking to get out of the house with their kids for a spell. It truly felt like a home away from home, and although there wasn’t any need for contact as all of our needs were met and more, Nathan was always available and right next door if necessary. The place is very clean and inviting and we’ll absolutely have ourselves another stay in the future. You’ll be making a great decision deciding to stay here as there’s more than meets the eye to this place. Safe travels to any future guests and we hope you enjoy your stay as much as we did.
Comfortable bed! Great location! Well stocked..The chickens we a surprise!
Another great stay! Will definitely be back again!

I have nothing negative to say about our stay at Nate’s place. The place was clean, well appointed and maintained, the bed was exceptionally comfortable, and check in/out was a breeze. Nate’s communication was great and the outdoor space was an added bonus for our two active pups (they loved seeing and playing with Willow, by the way). We couldn’t have asked for a better location or value. Highly recommend!
A great stay! Willow (the host's dog) is the cutest dog ever. My dog enjoyed playing with her and Nathan was kind enough to give us some fresh chicken eggs!

We had a great stay here! It was very close to things while also feeling like you were kind of out in the country. That said I thought it was cool, comfortable and a great value compared to the other prices I found for our week. We are 5Oyo fyi. We walked and Ubered for transportation and I thought it was great. Comfortable shoes make sense. Biking is good too. I wasn't sure how safe the area was for walking but it was no problem at all. If you like to walk I found it to be an easy walk to Calhouns, Market Square, Old City, the Arena and Stadium.
